results.deck: 22 Capcom games in one giant collection for the PlayStation 2 and Xbox.
results.name: Capcom Classics Collection

results.deck: Tactical military shooter based on the film of the same title, which is based on the novel by Tom Clancy.
results.name: The Sum of All Fears

results.deck: One Piece: Grand Battle is a fighting game in which players take control of characters from the uber popular anime and manga series, One Piece, and duke it out.
results.name: One Piece: Grand Battle

results.deck: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer follows a closer look into the movie, including chases with the Silver Surfer and fights with Dr. Doom. It also contains extra missions including finding scientists to save the world. It allows four player to each control a member of the Fantastic Four.
results.name: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer

results.deck: Video game tie-in to 2006 Winter Olympic Games in Torino.
results.name: Torino 2006

results.deck: LMA Manager 2004 is the fifth game in the LMA Manager series. It introduced a new menu interface and a Fantasy Team mode.
results.name: LMA Manager 2004

results.deck: Crime is everywhere on the streets of New York City. As Frank "the Punisher" Castle, it is your job to clean them up. However, there seem to be bigger things at hand...
results.name: The Punisher

results.deck: Nitro Kart takes Crash Bandicoot and friends to the streets in this kart-racer with multiple tracks and characters to choose from.
results.name: Crash Nitro Kart

results.deck: A Robotech themed game based on the Third Robotech War.  It was a shooter that allowed the player to take on a human form or transform into a motorcycle to fight the invading Invid on all fronts.
results.name: Robotech: Invasion

results.deck: Strike Force Bowling is a budget bowling title for Xbox, PS2, and GameCube.
results.name: Strike Force Bowling

results.deck: This compilation contains The King of fighters '94 through '98.
results.name: The King of Fighters Collection: The Orochi Saga

results.deck: The Ghost Recon team must enter Mexico City and prevent a coup d'état led by rebel Mexican forces.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Advanced Warfighter

results.deck: Disaster Report (or SOS The Final Escape) is a survival action/adventure game where you play Keith, a newspaper editor, trying to escape a city hit by an earthquake.
results.name: Disaster Report

results.deck: In Def Jam: Vendetta you fight your way through the underground street fighting world to earn money and respect.
results.name: Def Jam: Vendetta

results.deck: Remedy's film-noir action game puts players in the role of grizzled cop Max Payne as he tries to clear his name of murder.
results.name: Max Payne

results.deck: NHL Hitz Pro is a licensed ice hockey game, released in September 2003 for the Playstation 2, Xbox and Nintendo Gamecube.
results.name: NHL Hitz Pro

results.deck: A multiplayer vehicular-combat game for the PS2. It was featured as a free pack-in game with the Playstation 2 network adapter.
results.name: Hardware: Online Arena

results.deck: Full Spectrum Warrior: Ten Hammers is the sequel to Pandemic's modern war game, which allows players to lead mechanized infantry units and engage in multiplayer tactical combat.
results.name: Full Spectrum Warrior: Ten Hammers

results.deck: Sequel to one of the most famous games of all time, The Sims 2 introduces a new engine and many new gameplay features to the franchise.
results.name: The Sims 2

results.deck: Indigo Prophecy is a mystery-driven action/adventure game that harkens back to the point-and-click era. The game incorporates rhythm mini-games at key points as you try to figure out why you murdered a stranger in a local diner.
results.name: Indigo Prophecy

results.deck: Tom, Jerry and friends go for an all out war in this four player fighter.
results.name: Tom and Jerry: War of the Whiskers

results.deck: Get all the Shen Gong Wu as your favorite Xiaolin Showdown characters based on the Kids WB Cartoon of the same name!
results.name: Xiaolin Showdown

results.deck: Men in Black II: Alien Escape is a third person shooter that puts the players in the shoes of MiB agents J & K as they try to stop an alien invasion.
results.name: Men in Black II: Alien Escape

results.deck: Britney's Dance Beat is a single player and two player rhythm game featuring the singer's songs and videos where the player's goal is to pass a series of auditions to become a dancer on her tour.
results.name: Britney's Dance Beat

results.deck: An American college basketball game.
results.name: ESPN College Hoops 2K5

results.deck: Aggressive Inline takes the gameplay of the Tony Hawk series and applies it to inline skating, adding in an innovative skill progression system for good measure.
results.name: Aggressive Inline

results.deck: Follow the story of John Anderton in this action game loosely based on the events of the feature film.
results.name: Minority Report: Everybody Runs

results.deck: A vehicular combat game based around monster trucks.
results.name: Monster Jam: Maximum Destruction

results.deck: An animal themed puzzle game.
results.name: ZooCube

results.deck: An insane roster of characters from both Marvel and Capcom battles out in crazy 3-on-3 tag-team matches in the fourth installment of the Marvel vs. Capcom series.
results.name: Marvel vs. Capcom 2: New Age of Heroes

results.deck: Return to Castle Wolfenstein is an occult spin on World War II, as Hitler uses the power of the dead to try and win the war.
results.name: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Operation Resurrection

results.deck: Rescue your family's farm and the surrounding village from being turned into a resort. Remember... it's up to you to save the homeland.
results.name: Harvest Moon: Save the Homeland

results.deck: The Hellish Tactical Strategy RPG Disgaea: Hour of Darkness has a sequel, and Disgaea 2: Cursed Memories is here, expanding on nearly everything that made the first one great; complete with even more Prism Ranger antics! Adell must break the curse on the land and turn everyone back into Humans.
results.name: Disgaea 2: Cursed Memories

results.deck: Swing Away Golf is a golf game for the PlayStation 2.
results.name: Swing Away Golf

results.deck: Test Drive: Le Mans puts you behind the wheel of real-life racing machines and lets you tackle the legendary "24 Hours of Le Mans" race.
results.name: Test Drive: Le Mans

results.deck: Crimson Tears is a cel-shaded beat-em'-up set in future Tokyo from Capcom for the PlayStation 2.
results.name: Crimson Tears

results.deck: Transworld Surf is a surfing game comparable to the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series, but for surfing. The player can choose from a number of surfers and various spots around the world to test their surfing skills.
results.name: TransWorld SURF

results.deck: Art of Fighting is SNK's second foray into the fighting game genre, known for its large character sprites and use of a super gauge.
results.name: Art of Fighting

results.deck: Pipe Dream is a puzzle game where players have to connect random pieces of pipe on a 2d grid in a limited time. The game was originally released under the name Pipe Mania on the Amiga.
results.name: Pipe Dream

results.deck: Cy Girls is a third-person action game based off of a line of Japanese action figures. The game's story was on two discs, one for each of the two main characters that focus on different types of combat.
results.name: Cy Girls

results.deck: Competitive shooter with flavors of Galaga, Fighting Games, and Sailor Moon.
results.name: Twinkle Star Sprites

results.deck: Bujingai: The Forsaken City is a hack 'n' slash game that takes place in post-apocalyptic Japan. An ancient warrior named Lau must cut his way through hordes of demons to save the world.
results.name: Bujingai: The Forsaken City

results.deck: A survival horror game, starring one Fiona Belli who awakens from a car accident to find herself trapped in a strange castle. Aided by her dog, Hewie, she must escape without falling victim to its twisted occupants.
results.name: Haunting Ground

results.deck: Control medieval armies and develop a bolstering economy in this genre defining strategy game.
results.name: Age of Empires II: The Age of Kings

results.deck: A stealth-based horror game that takes place in the small village of Hanuda, Japan. The main enemies are zombie-like creatures known as Shibitos.
results.name: Siren

results.deck: Remember11 is a visual novel developed by KID and is the 4th entry in the Infinity series.
results.name: Remember 11: The Age of Infinity

results.deck: Playstation 2 Sequel to the Playstation sleeper hit, Valkyrie Profile.
results.name: Valkyrie Profile 2: Silmeria

results.deck: Teen Titans game is the 2nd Teen Titans game made, and has the 5 main Teen Titans members from the TV Series which it is based on: Robin, Cyborg, Raven, Starfire, and Beast Boy.
results.name: Teen Titans

results.deck: Developed by Double Fine Productions, Psychonauts is a platforming action-adventure game in which players take on the role of Razputin, a young psychic out to thwart an evil plot to subvert the minds of other powerful psychics.
results.name: Psychonauts

results.deck: Phantasy Star - Generation:2 is a graphical upgrade of the 16-bit game Phantasy Star II.  It includes enhanced cutscenes and character designs.
results.name: SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.17: Phantasy Star - Generation:2

results.deck: The first and only version of Konami's ground-breaking music game franchise, beatmania IIDX, to be released in the United States.
results.name: beatmania

results.deck: A Simple Series action driving game where the player must rescue survivors of a zombie plague in an ambulance and get them to the hospital for treatment before they turn.
results.name: Zombie Virus

results.deck: XIII is a cel-shaded first-person shooter based on the comic book of the same name, which was in turn inspired by Robert Ludlum's book The Bourne Identity.
results.name: XIII

results.deck: The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age is a role-playing game depicting the adventures of the "Shadow Fellowship," a group of unknowns following in the footsteps of the Fellowship of the Ring.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age

results.deck: Take on the role of Gordon Freeman as he escapes the disastrous aftermath of an experiment gone wrong in the Black Mesa Research Facility.
results.name: Half-Life

results.deck: From the creative minds behind the original Tomb Raider games comes this innovative fantasy herd-'em-up/platformer/puzzler.
results.name: Herdy Gerdy

results.deck: Namco Museum is a collection of arcade games made by Namco.
results.name: Namco Museum

results.deck: Warriors of Might and Magic is an action role-playing game developed by 3DO. Step into the shoes of Alleron, a soldier framed for a crime he didn't commit, and seek to discover the truth behind this conspiracy.
results.name: Warriors of Might and Magic

results.deck: Dead to Rights is an action game by Namco that puts you in the shoes of Jack Slate, a fugitive cop who's been framed for murder.
results.name: Dead to Rights

results.deck: The third entry in the mainline Summon Night series developed by Flight-Plan for the PlayStation 2.
results.name: Summon Night 3

results.deck: Conflict: Desert Storm places you in the shoes of four SAS or Delta Force specialists as you are tasked with spearheading the assault on Iraq as they invade Kuwait.
results.name: Conflict: Desert Storm

results.deck: Rise of the Kasai is the sequel to The Mark of Kri.
results.name: Rise of the Kasai

results.deck: This is a Bo-bobo game that was released for the PS2 in 2003 by Hudson Soft.
results.name: BoBoBo~Bo Bo~BoBo: Hajike Matsuri!

results.deck: Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life is the first iteration of the popular series to appear on the Nintendo Gamecube. It was later released for the PlayStation 2 as well.
results.name: Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life

results.deck: A video game based on the popular singing competition show.
results.name: American Idol

results.deck: Champions: Return to Arms is a direct follow up to Champions of Norrath, a popular hack n' slash RPG for the Playstation 2.
results.name: Champions: Return to Arms

results.deck: It's up to the Simpsons cast to save Springfield in this open-world driving game.
results.name: The Simpsons: Hit & Run

results.deck: Digimon Rumble Arena 2 (Digimon Battle Chronicle in Japan) is a Digimon fighting game released in 2004 by Bandai Games for the GameCube, PlayStation 2, and the Xbox.
results.name: Digimon Rumble Arena 2

results.deck: Sega superstars is an eyetoy game for Sony’s PS2, it features 12 games to play and many popular Sega franchises including Sonic, Super Monkey Ball and Samba de Amigo.
results.name: SEGA SuperStars

results.deck: Turok:  Evolution is a re-imagining of the acclaimed first person shooter series for Xbox, PS2 and GCN.  Many fans say this entry, however, fails to live up to the standard set by its predecessors.
results.name: Turok: Evolution

results.deck: And RC car racing game where doing spins, flips and other stunts earns you points that can be exchanged for upgrades.
results.name: Stunt GP

results.deck: Call of Duty: Finest Hour, developed by Spark Unlimited and Kuju Entertainment, was the first Call of Duty game to appear on home consoles and remains a console exclusive.
results.name: Call of Duty: Finest Hour

results.deck: The eighth entry in the Might and Magic series begins to show the formula's age despite being a new adventure. In this chapter, the Planeswalker Escaton has arrived in the land spelling its doom. It is up to a brave party of adventurers to thwart the prophecy he brings.
results.name: Might and Magic VIII: Day of the Destroyer

results.deck: Robot Wars: Arenas of Destruction is a video game based on the popular British Game show where home made robots would fight with the aim of imobilising their opponent(s)
results.name: Robot Wars: Arenas of Destruction

results.deck: The eighth Japanese release in the main Dance Dance Revolution series, and ninth release in North American.
results.name: Dance Dance Revolution EXTREME
